attributes.comment:
I fully support USCIS-2006-0044 and actually feel the fee's are TOO LOW! I
cannot believe that EVERY year the fee is not raised and this is LONG overdue!
WHY do we want to encourage "low-income" immigrators? That's ridiculous! The
benefits received once they are citizens are SO much more than the fee's they are
paying AND that is not even being considered. I believe user fees SHOULD fund
the entire USCIS budget and also should fund other areas where immigrants are
getting a FREE ride now. I DO NOT want Congress appropriating discretionary
funds for immigration...not even $1.

I know this is OPEN to public comment...but I do not believe anyone who is NOT
currently a citizen should even be heard...they have NO right to comment on the
fee's when they currently have NO voting rights in this Country!

If User fees can't keep the immigration agency up to date, then the fee's should be
increased to a level that they CAN. Why are taxpayers paying for this?

We jail our border agents when they do their job and so the message is we are pro-
immigration. Well, I am ONE US Citizen who is NOT pro-immigration as they will
eventually out-number the REAL Americans at the rate we are going. Congress
needs to wake-up and reallt get a better feel for what they are doing to the
landscape of America!

Thank you for allowing my comments.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Cheryl L. Gonzalez
